title: Learnership Opportunity Available to People Living with a Disability
text:
If you are passionate about learning & gaining work experience at the same time, this advert is for you!

Our company specializes in recruitment, to register with us cost you absolutely nothing! No catch. A consultant will take you through an interview phase to establish what you have done thus far in terms of your employment history and education.

Once you have completed the interview process, you will be registered on our Isilumko database as we actively seek employment opportunities with our client that falls in line with your Cv particulars.

If you are interested in registering with our company, send waheedah.chellan@isilumko.co.za an email, attach your CV, Copy of ID, Copy of your highest Grade passed and we will get back to you with an interview date.

Our clients offer various learnership opportunities:

- End-User Computing NQF Level 3

- Business Administration NQF 2/3/4

- Generic Management NQF /3/4

- Marketing NQF 3/4

- Hygiene and Cleaning NQF 2/3

All Learnership programmes are over a period of 12 months and stipends which arrange from R3000 - R7000. These programmes run once a year, every year with us, Isilumko Staffing.

Area's Isilumko recruits:

- Western Cape

- Eastern Cape

- Port Elizabeth

- Gauteng

- Limpopo

- East London

Thank you for reading,

The Isilumko Team,

78 Salt River Road, Woodstock, Cape Town, 7925
